claim_evidence: their quality is comparable but they effectively complement each other in terms of rule coverage
evidence: We found that their quality is comparable but they effectively complement each other in terms of rule coverage .
text: We found that their quality is comparable but they effectively complement each other in terms of rule coverage .

claim_evidence: most learned rules are not paraphrases but rather one-directional entailment rulesmany of the rules are context sensitive
evidence: Also , we found that most learned rules are not paraphrases but rather one-directional entailment rules , and that many of the rules are context sensitive .
text: Also , we found that most learned rules are not paraphrases but rather one-directional entailment rules , and that many of the rules are context sensitive .

evidence: We also conducted the first comparison between two state-of-the-art acquisition algorithms , DIRT and TEASE , using the new methodology .
text: We also conducted the first comparison between two state-of-the-art acquisition algorithms , DIRT and TEASE , using the new methodology .
